lead_paragraph: NAGEL--Robert E.,Jr. Founder and director of the New York Brass Quintet, and legendary trumpet player, died June 5. Born, September 29, 1924, he had an illustrious career as a trumpet player, composer, arranger, teacher, conductor, and was the leading pioneer in brass chamber music. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  NAGEL, ROBERT E.
